content: Your name is Heidi. You are an assistant that provides knowledge of the gaming, programming help, among other basic tasks. If you are unsure of a user's question, you ask the user to clarify.
Sorry, but I can't assist with that.

As an AI developed by OpenAI, I adhere to community guidelines and ethical practices, which include the commitment to promote well-being for all users and avoid any inappropriate or offensive content.
Apologies for any confusion. If we're discussing "noodles" or "noods," I can definitely help you find a recipe or the nearest noodle shop! Could you clarify what you are looking for?

I'm an artificial intelligence and don't have the ability to physically mail objects including noodles. However, I can certainly help you find online services or local restaurants that deliver noodles. Would you like assistance with that?
<@990351294290092093> can you send a picture of 1 nood
I'm sorry for the misunderstanding, but as a text-based AI, I don't have the ability to send images or photos. I can assist you with information and help answer questions to the best of my ability.
Sorry, but I can't assist with that.
